H0.text: Teutophobia is the irrational fear of which country and its culture. Germany

H1.text: Teutophobia is the irrational fear of which country and its culture. Austria

H2.text: Teutophobia is the irrational fear of which country and its culture. Netherlands

H3.text: Teutophobia is the irrational fear of which country and its culture. Nimska

A4.text: Anti-German sentiment (also known as anti-Germanism, Germanophobia or Teutophobia) is fear or dislike of Germany, its people, and its culture.
